content: निरूप् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To see, perceive, mark or observe carefully; न च महावने पंथा निरूपितः <ls>K. 120.</ls> {@--2@} To investigate, examine, look out for, search. {@--3@} To fix upon, determine, settle, resolve. {@--4@} To choose, select, appoint. {@--5@} To reflect, consider. {@--6@} To act, represent dramatically, gesticulate. {@--7@} To perform.
